Others: Jalen Brunson's shooting struggles were evident in the game, but he still managed to lead all scorers in the final frame with 10 points.
Karl-Anthony Towns' passing ability has been a pleasant surprise for the Knicks, with an over-the-back-of-his-head dime getting the most oohs and ahhs.
The Knicks' defense was still the footing that was unsure, though holding the Sixers under 100 points on 37% from the field and 33% from deep offers at least a hint of traction.
Joel Embiid was clearly rusty and not in game shape after missing the entire preseason and opening weeks of the season, his body winded, his shot off.
